channel.title: Tools on Helping You Learn Data Science!

item.title: How to Look like a 10x developer

item.title: Create an Awesome Development Setup for Data Science using Atom
item.description: Before I even begin this article, let me just say that I love iPython Notebooks, and Atom is not an alternative to Jupyter in any way.

item.title: A Layman’s Guide for Data Scientists to create APIs in minutes

item.title: How and Why to use f strings in Python3?
item.description: Python provides us with many styles of coding. And with time, Python has regularly come up with new coding standards and tools that adhere even more to the coding standards in the Zen of Python.

item.title: Minimal Pandas Subset for Data Scientists on GPU
